title: FixPoint: Revolutionizing EV Services
narration: Welcome to FixPoint your premier partner in electric vehicle care. We are revolutionizing the future of transportation providing cuttingedge services powered by advanced technologies to enhance your EV experience.

title: End-to-End EV Services
content:
Comprehensive solutions for all EVs.
Serving owners, dealers, and corporations.
Your one-stop EV service provider.
image_desc: Electric vehicles driving on road. Type: stock footage
narration: At FixPoint we offer endtoend services designed to cater to every electric vehicle need. Whether you are an individual EV owner a preowned vehicle dealer or a large corporate entity we have the expertise and resources to keep your EVs running smoothly and efficiently. We've got you covered.

title: Expert EV Maintenance & Repair
content:
Complete lifecycle management.
Maintenance, repairs, and roadside assistance.
Accessories and upgrades available.
image_desc: EV service center with technicians. Type: stock photo
narration: Our team of highly skilled technicians ensures that your electric vehicle receives the best possible care. We offer a complete lifecycle management solution including routine maintenance complex repairs reliable roadside assistance and a wide range of accessories to enhance your vehicle. Your vehicle is in the best hands with FixPoint.

title: Hassle-Free Service Scheduling
content:
Easy-to-use platform and app.
Schedule services with ease.
Tire checks to battery replacements.
image_desc: Customer scheduling service on laptop. Type: stock photo
narration: Scheduling services for your electric vehicle has never been easier with FixPoint's userfriendly platform and mobile app. From simple tire checks to comprehensive battery replacements our platform provides a hasslefree experience allowing you to book appointments and manage your EV's maintenance with ease.

title: Catering to Diverse Needs
content:
Serving EV owners, dealers, and fleets.
Cost-effective solutions.
Promoting sustainability.
image_desc: Split screen with EV owners, corporate clients, and government officials. Type: composite image
narration: FixPoint is dedicated to meeting the diverse needs of all our clients including individual EV owners preowned vehicle dealers commercial fleets and government bodies. We provide costeffective solutions that not only minimize expenses but also promote sustainability and help combat pollution.

title: Doorstep EV Service
content:
Convenient at-home service.
Expert technicians at your location.
Save time and effort.
image_desc: Technician providing doorstep service. Type: stock photo
narration: Need a service but can't make it to our center No problem. FixPoint offers convenient doorstep service bringing our expert technicians directly to your location. Enjoy the convenience of professional EV maintenance without ever having to leave the comfort of your home or office.

title: Nationwide Franchise Network
content:
Franchises across India.
Bringing EV care to your area.
Reliable service nationwide.
image_desc: FixPoint franchise map of India. Type: graphic
narration: With a growing network of franchises located across India FixPoint is committed to providing nationwide service coverage. We are bringing the future of electric vehicle care to every corner of the country ensuring that you have access to reliable and professional EV services wherever you are.

title: Affordable & Transparent Pricing
content:
Affordable service options.
No hidden fees.
Transparent approval process.
image_desc: Happy customers driving EVs. Type: stock footage
narration: At FixPoint we believe in affordable reliable and transparent service. We promise no hidden fees and every service is approved by you before it's invoiced. You can trust us to provide honest and upfront pricing ensuring that you always know what to expect.

title: Download the FixPoint App
content:
App now live and free.
Access EV services at your fingertips.
Download from App Store/Google Play.
image_desc: FixPoint app download screen. Type: graphic
narration: Exciting news The FixPoint app is now live and available for free download on both the App Store and Google Play. Access a world of EV services right at your fingertips making it easier than ever to manage your vehicle's maintenance and care. So what are you waiting for

title: FixPoint: Driving a Sustainable Future
content: Visit fixpoint.in or Download the App.
narration: FixPoint is maximizing your automobile experience and driving us all towards a sustainable future. Visit fixpoint.in or download the app today to experience the future of EV care.

title: Contact Us
content: For any inquiries, call us at +8871258981 one or email us at mohit@fixpoint.in.
image_desc: Contact information with phone and email. Type: graphic
narration: For any inquiries please don't hesitate to reach out to us. You can call or email us  mohit at fixpoint.in. We're here to help with all your EV needs.
